alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Butler; Choctaw; Clarke; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland; Monroe; Washington; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 07 at 2:32AM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT TODAY FOR SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI...SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS AND CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR SUNDAY FOR SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA FOR DRY FUELS AND VERY LOW HUMIDITIES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWEST AND SOUTHCENTRAL ALABAMA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR SOUTHWEST AND SOUTHCENTRAL ALABAMA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...For today, north 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. For Sunday, winds around 10 mph with potential gusts up to 20 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...For today, as low as 17 percent. For Sunday, as low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
